wordGroup: fungal infection 真菌感染；霉菌感染

sentences.en: Athlete's foot is a fungal infection.
sentences.cn: 脚癣是由真菌感染引起的。

sentences.en: Fungal agents that have been studied include Coccidioides.
sentences.cn: 已研究的真菌制剂包括球孢子菌属。

sentences.en: Alternaria alternata is one of the most important and common fungal allergens in the world.
sentences.cn: 互隔交链孢霉是世界上最重要和最常见的真菌过敏原之一。
